properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tumsifu Maria
enyi wanae,
tumtolee salamu
tumshangilie.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ave ave ave Maria,
ave ave ave Maria.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Katika uwingu
ni mfalme mkuu,
mwondoa hatari
mama wa Mungu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nyota ya bahari
mlango wa mbingu,
mwondoa hatari
mama wa Mungu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Maria bikira
ndiye mteule,
ndiye mwana bora
tangu milele.
